summary: The diff implements comprehensive backend logic fixes for both reset functions (nextDayReset and skippedDayReset) with proper strike count updates, includes a migration module to reset existing strike counts to 0, and adds frontend integration with two reset mutations and proper UI components. All three requirements appear to be fully addressed.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module that resets all existing routine strike counts to 0
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention any data migration requirements. The migration.mo file was added to reset strike counts across all users, but this was not requested in the requirements or constraints.
